casebody.data:
UNITED STATES v. Lester SHORT. No. 5446. Circuit Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. April 10, 1935. Arthur Roe, of Vandalia, Ill., for the United States. Frank C. Wade, of Terre Haute, Ind., for appellee.

Before SPARKS, FITZHENRY, and ALSCHULER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

On motion of counsel for appellant, it is now here ordered and adjudged by this court that this appeal be, and the same is hereby, dismissed.
